name: Porch
longDes: You are on the front porch of the mansion. There are two imposing gargoyles flanking the top of the stairs leading up to the double-doors of the house proper. They appear to be monstrous birds of some sort. The ^left gargoyle# appears to be looking at you out of the corner of its eyes. The ^right gargoyle# seems to be pointing. To the $North# is the main entry to the house. To the $South# are the front lawns of the mansion grounds.
shortDes: You are standing on the front porch of the mansion. There is one ^left gargoyle#, and a ^right gargoyle#, as you stand at the main entry to the mansion. To the $North# are the doors of the house. To the $South# are the front lawns.

features.name: left gargoyle
features.preActionDes: This gargoyle appears to be a bird of grotesque proportion. It looks like it's splashing water in a bird bath.

features.name: right gargoyle
features.preActionDes: This gargoyle is a bird of grotesque proportion. It's perched with one claw pointing to the tree in the front lawn.
